title: Claiming Danny

Then they encounter Danny, by far the best looking Zayre boy of them all. He is every top's dream. He is sweet, adorable, and he never says no. But it's far too risky for someone as gorgeous as Danny to let every man have him, and Danny doesn't know how to stop. Who will rescue him?
